content: ष {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Best, excellent. {@--2@} Wise, learned. --षः {@--1@} Loss, destruction. {@--2@} End. {@--3@} Rest, remainder. {@--4@} Final emancipation. {@--5@} Loss of knowledge. {@--6@} Heaven. {@--7@} Sleep. {@--8@} A learned man. {@--9@} A teat or nipple. {@--10@} Hair. {@--11@} Delivery ( गर्मविमोचन).
